title: Obstetric Emergency Simulation-Based Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Knowledge and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: A blended educational environment combining simulation labs with theoretical lectures. Strengthens capabilities in obstetric and emergency response through team-based learning and repetitive training

learning_goals: Perform technical procedures according to standardized protocols with 90% accuracy in obstetric and emergency scenarios
Achieve team efficiency of over 80% by applying teamwork and communication skills during high-risk deliveries

Learners will analyze problem situations in clinical settings through 2-week simulation training (3 patient cases) and write critical thinking reports meeting ≥4 of 5 rubric items (clinical judgment, alternative proposals, rationale explanation).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
